description: We take Dominik Rider to the Nob Hill Theater for some fun. The slut boy wants to go down to the video arcade because he’s always hungry for cocks. After Dominik gets his fill in the glory holes, Tristan Jaxx takes him upstairs into the main theater full of horny men. It costs us $20 to get into the arcade so we make Dominik service the men in the theater for tips. He earns a dollar at time and we beat him for being so damn slow. We fuck the hell out of him and spray our hot loads all over his face while the crowd cheers.
title: The Nob Hill Theater Slut
